comment: Professor Welborn is honestly one of the greatest professors I've ever had. She truly cares about her students and tries really hard to make everyone as comfortable as possible in a Public Speaking class. She gives very specific notes as to what will be on the tests, so make sure you're in class. If I could I would love to be in her class again.

Really really kind woman. I'm terrified of public speaking and she made it so much easier to get up there and talk in front of people. I can't stress this enough-- everything she says is on the exams so definitely take good notes! If you hate speaking in public TAKE THIS PROFESSOR! Such a nice lady.

Such a nice lady, everything (and only, so you don't need a text book) she says in class will be on the test so make sure you take notes, but its super easy to remember because she gives real life examples and keeps the class laughing. Speeches were graded pretty easily and one was dropped since there was not enough time.  Sweet lady take her.

I've got 3 words for anyone trying to decide who to take for COM2129: TAKE. THIS. PROFESSOR!! I promise you WILL be happy you did!! Hands down I would take her again, and again if I could. Love! Love! Love! She makes learning so much fun. Very witty. Will make you laugh. Connects with each of us. Likable. Personable. You won't regret it! PS Easy A!

Mrs. Welborn is an angel. Hands down the best professor I've ever had. I absolutely dreaded this class, but she goes out of her way to make you feel comfortable during your speeches (or "kittens" as she calls them). She genuinely cares about her students & wants to see them succeed. She's really funny too! Seriously, if you can, TAKE HER!

Mrs. Welborn is by far my favorite professor. She truly cares about her students and wants them to feel at ease during and before your speeches. She has a heart of gold and will always try to make you laugh. Her tests sometimes require you to actually show up to class. I wish she taught more courses.

She is such a kind person. She cares about her students more than most teachers. She isn't an "easy" teacher per-say, but she isn't difficult either. An A won't be handed to you, but follow her guidelines and give good speeches and you're golden!

Welborn is seriously the best professor I've had and would take her class again in a heartbeat. It seems like a hard class because of all the speeches, but it's such an easy class. The midterm and final are hard if you don't study enough, but they're not terrible. I highly suggest her class for public speaking she's hella chill and really funny

I cannot put into words how much Mrs. Welborn helped me during my semester in her public speaking class. Hands down, best professor I've ever had. She is an incredibly kind soul. If you like humorous professors, take her. When she lectures, she keeps you interested with funny jokes. She does her best to help with anything you need.

professor welborn is literally the best. she took out one of our speeches and does the other ones her way. class is kind of boring when we have to take notes because she just talks, but write down everything she says because it will be on the test. i barely used my book. theres only two tests and you can only miss 3 classes. but take her for sure.

Best. Teacher. Ever. This class isn't fun for anyone, but she makes it as easy as she can. She is really funny and keeps class fun. She is willing to work with you if you have any problems. 2 tests and 4-5 speeches. I wish she taught more COM classes.

Very monotone but don't let this discourage you. She is very witty and has hilarious stories to tell. We had 4 speeches throughout the semester, and she makes them less intimidating. Very straightforward, and is very willing to help and answer questions. Gets to know her students personally & actually cares. Exams are super easy. Would recommend.

just read the comments below and take professor welborn. 4 speeches, 2 tests, some in classes, and little stress. fight for this class with her. if you have to sabotage another student to get in her class, do it.

ABSOLUTE BEST TEACHER I HAVE EVER HAD!!! If you do not take her, then you are definitely missing out. I wish she was teaching other courses because I would take her in a heartbeat. She makes you feel so comfortable and confident when you speak even if you feel like you struggle. She is also hilarious! you HAVE to take her, you will not regret it.

Mrs. Welborn is extremely helpful. She is so funny and entertaining. I know not many people like speaking in front of others but she honestly makes it so easy. If you have the chance I would definitely take her class

BEST TEACHER I HAVE EVER HAD. She is so nice, so caring, and truly genuine. She will help you with ANYTHING and is very understanding. You CANNOT go wrong choosing her! I wish she could teach every class I have. LOVE HER!
She is the best teacher I have ever had. Take her if you can. Class is always fun and she makes public speaking less scary. BEST. TEACHER.

Took Welborn during the summer to knock out some gen ed classes. She is a very respectful and clear professor. Very unbiased and willing to help everyone. Class is easy. BUT that doesnt mean getting an A is easy. I'd say most of students get a B because there is a fine line between an A speech and a B speech. She is very fair and understanding.

Mrs. Welborn is by far the best teacher I have had at KSU, probably anywhere. Two tests, three speeches, and she makes public speaking comfortable for you even if you hate it. Easy assignments help your grade and the tests are common sense. If you can't get at least a B in here there is something wrong with you.

Mrs. Welborn, is my far one of the best teachers at KSU. You have three speeches, and two exams. The speeches are easy topics, and the exams are easy. If you want a easy, great, and helpful teacher, Mrs. Welborn is the teacher to take!! Easy A or B. Take her for public speeching

Mrs. Welborn is excellent! For public speaking, she is very understanding and helpful. She will go out of her way to make sure you do well and is very flexible if you do miss class due to illness, etc. She has a great sense of humor and really does her best to make public speaking a pleasant experience for everyone - novices to experts.

Mrs. Welborn's class was amazing! It was a late class and I was worried about being able to pay attention but she made everything SO interesting. She loves what she teaches which in turn made me love it. I HIGHLY recommend taking her class if you have any interest in communication. Shes wonderful
I am in her class....you cannot fall asleep and it is a late class. I know I will do well in this class.

Mrs. Welborne is by far my favorite teacher since ive started school at KSU. She is funny, very relaxed, and everything that you need for tests are on the notes that she verbally gives you. I had her in the morning at 9:30 and i always looked forward to her class even if i was exhausted. I definitely recommend her for communications 1109.

I absolutely loved Mrs. Welborn. She does lecture almost every day, but she always throws in jokes, so it makes you want to pay attention. She has a great sense of humor and is extremely helpful if a problem arises. TAKE HER!!!

AMAZING TEACHER!!!! She is very funny and her smile makes you feel better when you see it. She jokes around with the class as well as herself. Tests are easy, just look over your notes. She tells you what is on the test. TO GET ON HER GOOD SIDE THE MOMENT YOU SEE HER....TALK ABOUT DOGS. She loves them. Overall, TAKE HER

Take Mrs. Welborn for COM 1109!! I can't stress enough how much I enjoyed her class! There is only 1 speech at the end of the semester, with a partner.  She couldn't have been more helpful and understanding about the speeches. Wish I could take another class with her!
I loved her! She was a great professor. Extremely helpful, lectures were interesting, and she was really nice. Tests are easy and class is fun. Strongly reccomend taking her!

She was a great professor. Her lectures were interesting and she brought activities that kept you ingaged. Her tests were fair and if you attend class you should make an A on them. Take her for Comm 1109!

Great teacher! No homework. 4 multiple choice tests. 1 speech - with a partner. Interesting lectures. You gotta got to class to get lecutre notes. Tests are from lecture. You have to study, but you can get an A if you give it some effort. Teacher is very likeable. Fun class. Take her!!
Mrs. Welbourn is awesome and funny too.  She's very caring and understandable.  Her test are a little tricky but if you study you should do ok.  I would recommend everyone to take her.

Not an easy A, but she is by far the best teacher i've had. She relates to the students in a lot of levels, her examples are based on current events or pop culture. She is funny, fair and doesn't play favorites. I highly recommend her for those interested in learning.
The best teacher I have ever had! A wonderful lady! She is really funa dn I always look forward to her class! I would take her for everything... SERIOUSLY!

I highly suggest taking this teacher if you must or would like to take communications. She's funny, fun, knows what she's talking about, and relates extremely well with the students. The class is involved in almost every lecture. Her tests were easy. All multiple choice and a couple short answer. Assignments were fun! Speech is only 5min your topic
